Insanely short racing game for players who love the competition of betting on different racer.



ðŸ’­ Game Idea

All players choose a character at the beginning of the race. After they selected one the race starts.

Since every character races randomly the outcome is always different and itâ€™s a pure luck battle. The sprint ends when the first character reaches the finishing line and therefore reveals the winner.

1-4 players

Players

10 seconds per race

Duration

Pick character
Watch them race
